message.name: ERR_XRV_DUPLICATE
message.locale: A program type milestone configuration record already exists for this program, %1s, and milestone configuration, %2s.

message.name: ERR_FV_PROGRAM_TYPE_MANDATORY
message.locale: A program type must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_MILESTONE_CONFIGURATION_MANDATORY
message.locale: A milestone configuration must be specified.
